title: We need to talk: employer/employee communication
brief_description: This business management resource has been designed by professionals with people management experience in a variety of industries including finance, manufacturing, hospitality and information services. The program is intended for use in a self study or group situation and details seven steps that comprise a successful agenda for meetings, as well as key counselling techniques. These steps and techniques are put into practice through two typical workplace scenarios.
